Class RareAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Action
      • RareAction
  • public class RareAction
extends Action
    This is a subclass of the Action Superclass. Action has a description and occurs on one or more dates. A RareAction activity occurs every year.
    Since:
    24.06.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tanzim Ahmed Sagar
